column.name: YWLX
column.option: 1|权益;2|固收(发行前);3|债券;4|新三板

column.name: SM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '

                  声  明  书

' +'

内核小组成员与本次参与表决的项目是否存在以下需要回避表决的情形：(请选择“是”或“否”)

' +'

1、本人或直系亲属担任待表决项目的项目组成员（包括该项目其他中介机构项目组成员）；

' +'

2、本人或直系亲属直接或间接持有待表决项目相关公司的股份等权益；

' +'

3、本人或直系亲属担任待表决项目相关公司的董事、监事、高级管理人员，或为待表决项目相关公司的实际控制人；

' +'

4、本人与待表决项目的项目组，归属于公司同一投行业务部门（团队），或待表决项目的项目组属于本人分管的承做部门（团队）；

' +'

上述条款中直系亲属包括配偶、子女和父母。

' +'

 

'

column.name: SFHB
column.comment: <font color=red>如存在声明中的情形，请在是否回避中选择“是”！<font>

column.name: SJLY
column.option: 0|本系统;1|原投行系统;2|协同系统

column.name: XTLCLJ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='http://oa.ebscn.com/workflow/request/ViewRequest.jsp?requestid='+OLDBH; '' //'下载'

column.name: SQSM
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color=red>在底稿系统中完成“尽职调查阶段”底稿上传工作，并在本系统中完成立项流程或书面立项流程后，才能发起内核流程。<font>'

column.name: SFDYSJZQ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_GS_NHLC_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>请确认您首次点击本流程的时间是知晓该项目信息的第一时间！<font>

column.name: ZQSJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> SFDYSJZQ==0||ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_GS_NHLC_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>知情时间不得晚于当天，否则视为无效时间</font>

constraint.SQL:
["(EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.LCIB_GS_LXLC T, JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY M
 WHERE T.XMMC = tIB_XMXX_GS.ID AND T.INSTID = M.ID AND M.STATE = 4 AND T.BJJG IN (1,2))
OR 
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_GS_LXSMSHLC T,JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY M
 WHERE T.XMMC = tIB_XMXX_GS.ID AND T.INSTID = M.ID AND M.STATE = 4)
)
AND EXISTS(
	SELECT 1 FROM DUAL WHERE 
	ECIF.FUNC_IB_LCFQCSJY('lcIB_GS_NHLC',tIB_XMXX_GS.ID,tIB_XMXX_GS.XMLX,{0})=1)",[{"expression":"ID","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

column.name: JZDCJDSCBL
column.describe: 尽职调查阶段上传比例
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> O_THIS.getColumn("JZDCJDSCBL").setLabel("底稿系统尽职调查阶段上传比例");

column.name: XMRYXXTS
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color=red>请先检查项目组负责人、项目组成员是否正确，再修改项目组人员信息。</font>'

column.name: SBRQTS
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color=red>即项目申报受理日期</font>'

constraint.SQL: ["tUser.OrgID in (SELECT ID FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION START WITH ID = 13831 CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID) \r\nand tUser.Status = 1",[]]
["tUser.OrgID in (SELECT ID FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION START WITH ID = 13831 CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID) \r\nand tUser.Status = 1",[]]

column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/excelOut?ywlx=120000&insid='+InstID+'&lcbd=lcIB_GS_NHLC'; '' //'下载'

column.name: JGTS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
客户单位是否持有“武器装备科研生产保密资格证书”、“武器装备科研生产许可证书”、“武器装备质量管理体系证书”、“装备承制单位资格证书”四证之一'

column.name: SHXT
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var i = ABS_LOADBEAN('com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.apexsoft.livebosbean.PageJumpToAms');
//var url=i.getLivebosPageUrl('admin','tIB_ZSHRW','tIB_ZSHRW_XJRW','');
var url=i.getCompleteUrl($Login.User.UserID,'/bss/ams/page/index.sdo#task')
 '<input type="button" onclick=\'window.open("'+url+'")\' value="审核系统" />'

column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKBSHYJHZ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1= ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'");
var cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.lcIB_GS_NHLC_ZKBSHYJHZ where lcIB_GS_NHLC_ID=?",[ID]);
(cnt1==0&&cnt2==0)||( cnt1==1 && ZKBSFYYJ==null)

column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> (((CJSHYJ!=1&&ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,99)==99)||ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,1)!=1 ) &&ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0 ) || (ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 1 && ZKBJYFJ==null)

(((CJSHYJ!=1&&ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,99)==99)||ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,1)!=1) && cnt1 == 0)|| (((ZKBSFYYJ!=1&&ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,99)==99)||ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,1)!=1)&&cnt1== 1)

(((CJSHYJ!=1&&ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,99)==99)||ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,1)!=1 ) && cnt1 == 0 ) || (((ZKBSFYYJ!=1&&ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,99)==99)||ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,1)!=1)&&cnt1 == 1)

column.name: XMDGYJXX
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT('底稿移交时间:' || DGYJSJ || ' | ' || '底稿存放地点及具体位置:' || CFDD || ' | ' || '底稿数量:' || DGSL || ' | ' || '底稿编号:' || DGBH || '|')) FROM ecif.lcIB_GS_NHLC_NHCL WHERE lcIB_GS_NHLC_ID = ?",[ID])

column.name: SFSCSBCL
column.describe: 是否上传全套申报材料
column.comment: 是否上传全套申报材料选择【是】后续才能选择是否用全套申报材料发起用印

column.name: LCBT_OA
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  sqsj = ABS_SQLVALUE("select to_number(to_char(SQSJ,'yyyymmdd')) from ecif.lcIB_GS_NHLC where id = ?",[ID]);
(SFSCSBCL != 1 && sqsj >= 20200912 )||( SFYQTSBCLFQYY==0 && sqsj<20200912)

column.name: GWZW_OA
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  sqsj = ABS_SQLVALUE("select to_number(to_char(SQSJ,'yyyymmdd')) from ecif.lcIB_GS_NHLC where id = ?",[ID]);
(SFSCSBCL != 1 && sqsj >= 20200912 )||( SFYQTSBCLFQYY==0 && sqsj<20200912)

column.name: QTSBCL
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  sqsj = ABS_SQLVALUE("select to_number(to_char(SQSJ,'yyyymmdd')) from ecif.lcIB_GS_NHLC where id = ?",[ID]);
sqsj >= 20200912 && QTSBCL == null

column.name: SCGWFJ
column.comment: <font color=red>请确保上传的附件与公文正文中列示的文件保持一致，该附件框中每一附件类型中仅上传一份最新版本附件至协同平台，用户可新增附件类型行</font>

column.name: SCGWDBXZ
column.describe: 上传公文附件打包下载
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=6'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'

column.name: YYBCWJ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var sqsj = ABS_SQLVALUE("select to_number(to_char(SQSJ,'yyyymmdd')) from ecif.lcIB_GS_NHLC where id = ?",[ID]); if (sqsj >= 20200912) { O_THIS.getColumn("YYBCWJ").setLabel("非用印备查文件
(不上传至OA)"); }else{ O_THIS.getColumn("YYBCWJ").setLabel("用印备查文件"); }

column.describe: 是否用全套申报材料发起用印
column.comment: 是否上传全套申报材料选择【是】才能选择是否用全套申报材料发起用印

column.name: OASPXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_GS_NHLC' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/oAsuggestion.sdo?oaWorkId="+oaid+"&lcbd=lcIB_GS_NHLC&lcbdId="+ID;
"<iframe id='lc_oayj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_GS_NHLC' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0

column.name: XMZFKNHBBS
column.describe: 项目组反馈内核办标识

command.describe: 外部委员表决信息维护

constraint.SQL:
["NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1
 	 FROM ECIF.LCIB_GS_NHLC T, JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY M
 WHERE T.XMMC = tIB_XMXX_GS.ID AND T.INSTID = M.ID AND M.STATE = 1 
 AND (NVL({0},0)=0 OR T.ID != {0}))",[{"expression":"ID","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

method.creator: 戴文生
method.name: lcIB_GS_NHLC_WWBJ
method.describe: 外部委员表决信息维护

column.option: 1|同意;3|有条件同意;4|暂缓;2|不同意

column.name: BJYJ_WE
column.option: 1|同意;3|有条件同意;4|暂缓;2|不同意
